oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General organic beekeeping data and market trends
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garibay, Salvador V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation "General organic beekeeping data and market trends" was part of the workshop "Organic beekeeping and market trends" at the BioFach Congress 2011. The aim of this workshop was to inform and discuss the current situation of production and market trends of organic beekeeping products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Garibay, Salvador V. (2011) General organic beekeeping data and market trends. Paper at: BioFach Congress 2011, Nuremberg, Germany, February 16th -19th 2011.
